tests.name: Style the Timetable with CSS. Add a stylesheet with the timetable.css and a a link in the html file to it
tests.feedback: Please add CSS styles to make your timetable visually appealing.

tests.name: Change Background Color
tests.feedback: Change the background color of the table to a color of your choice.
tests.javascript: (function() { var table = document.querySelector('table'); var bgColor = window.getComputedStyle(table).getPropertyValue('background-color'); return bgColor === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' ? 'true' : 'false'; })()

tests.name: Adjust Text Color
tests.feedback: Change the text color of the table rows or cells to a color of your choice.
tests.javascript: (function() { var td = document.querySelector('table td'); var textColor = window.getComputedStyle(td).getPropertyValue('color'); return textColor === 'rgb(0, 128, 0)' ? 'true' : 'false'; })()

tests.name: Add a Border
tests.feedback: Add a border to the table or its elements to make it stand out.
tests.javascript: (function() { var table = document.querySelector('table'); var borderStyle = window.getComputedStyle(table).getPropertyValue('border-style'); return borderStyle === 'solid' ? 'true' : 'false'; })()

tests.name: Adjust Text Alignment
tests.feedback: Change the text alignment within the table cells, e.g., center or right-align it.
tests.javascript: (function() { var td = document.querySelector('table td'); var textAlign = window.getComputedStyle(td).getPropertyValue('text-align'); return textAlign === 'center' ? 'true' : 'false'; })()
